criteria.desc: Netlist structure matches a PMOS-input folded cascode with a two-diode PMOS side and a cascoded PMOS tail (single-ended output; diode-connected PMOS ladder; PMOS tail + PMOS tail cascode feeding the pair; folded NMOS branches).
Mentions folded cascode, two-diode (or diode-connected ladder), PMOS tail cascode, and single-ended.
Avoids high-swing and fully differential or two-stage claims.
